channel.title: Help? 317 PI. Wilderness isn't working correctly
channel.description:
Okay, so, on my server I added a wilderness outside the bank of Camelot (Like the Delta Cammy PVP servers.) Well, kind of... The only problem is it SAYS I'm in lvl 8 wilderness (Which is what I want it to do) but it isn't actually wilderness. Where do I go to add a wilderness area to my 317 PI server? (ErasedPKz source to be exact)
Basically, it says I'm in wildy, but I can't actually attack.
Could someone atleast tell me where I'd edit if the player has the ability to attack another?
